title: Emigre Ephemera on Ebay
content:
_Looked like others had done this, apologies if it's not appropriate_

I'm getting rid of a bunch of [Emigre ephmera on ebay](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014034528/http:/cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=6971677709)

Figured someone in this crowd might be interested.
author: rschroed

comments.content: You'll get more action on eBay if you fix the spelling in your title. The word is "ephemera," with an "e" after the "ph."
